com.here.android.mpa.ar

Class ARController.InfoParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARController.InfoParams
  • Enclosing class:
    ARController

    public final class ARController.InfoParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates parameters which affect the info of an ARObject.
